description: Blue green knotted net linen ground with natural linen appliqué embroidered with multi-colored silk floss. Two cut side edges are loosely bound with silk thread.
medium: Linen, silk; appliqué embroidery on knotted net
text: It is quite possible that this panel was originally part of a valance or bed curtain. At this period beds were important and expensive pieces of furniture which were decorated with elaborate textiles for added warmth, privacy and, of course, as a display of conspicuous consumption.
title: Band
